string-array.name: preferencesDescriptions
string-array.item: Strength is the age old trait know since the first ape slapped another ape. Picking strength grants bonuses in STR and DEF while also providing faster XP gain in those skills.
Cunning relies on knowing when to strike. By using the environment to your advantage, cunning grants bonuses in CRIT and ACC while also providing faster XP gain in those skills.
Agility helps a hero move more nimbly out of the way of harm and into the way of a quick strike. Opting for agility grants bonuses in SPD and EVA while also providing faster XP gain in those skills.
